ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Airbomber came out of the CR Tank, healed now. Hello? Deemos, you still here? Infectra, are you hiding from me? Airbomber walked the halls of the Predacon

Airbomber came out of the CR Tank, healed now.

"Hello? Deemos, you still here? Infectra, are you hiding from me?" Airbomber
walked the halls of the Predacon cave.

"Huh? This place seems different, don't tell me Liono is back and has
already been remodeling the Ark!" Airbomber said. He walked into the room
with KitKat. He gasped. He realized he was in the Predacon cave. He tried to
run, but didn't know where to run to. He stood there frozen, hoping they
wouldn't notice him. He creeped toward a tunnel...
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, August 26, 2000 10:50 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>     Megatron and Waspinator retreat into the cave and slam the iron clad
door
> closed behinde them. Megatron was mad with Kitkat. It was her fault this
was
> going on. But, the bot must be an important bot if they want it so bad.
>     "Kitkat! What the hell do you think your doing?" He demanded, ready to
> pummle her with his closed fist. His eyes were closed into little angry
> crimsome slits.
>     Waspinator ran to the control boad and began to initiate more autoguns
> and re-routed power to the shields. He then turned to see if Megatron was
> going to beat Kitkat.
>
>     Aracnia oversaw the construction and was pleased. The shield generator
> was up and functional, and already they had twelve double barrle
auto-guns.
> And with the forest around them, they had a great advantage.
>     "Alright, Im going inside. Tarantulas you come too. I want to find out
> who these aliens are and why they made this bunker." She said, opening the
> hatch and getting ready to climb down.
>     Tarantulas walked over, "Very well. I would like to investigate this
new
> technology myself."
>     Thw two arachnids entered the bunker and climbed into the darkness.
>
>
>
>
